CustomField.description: If SOQL, fetch only contact ids or lead ids using SOQL select query. For complex criteria, choose ApexMethod (Format : %3CApexClassName%3E:%3CMethodName%3E
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If SOQL, fetch only contact ids or lead ids using SOQL select query. For complex criteria, choose ApexMethod (Format : %3CApexClassName%3E:MethodName%3E
CustomField.label: Rule Name
